application.controller

Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.controller.HomeController

  • public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Sam Carey, Melina KleinÎ©xcv d, Seth Chick This is the landing page; it will display RSS feeds within columns for all feeds like Flickr or any other feeds we can stream now The user can choose to filter feeds based on site, by clicking on an icon. When a user clicks an icon, we will build a new fxml page that is identical to the homepage.fxml except it will only display RSS for the selected site

        public HomeController()
        This is the landing page; it will display RSS feeds within columns for all feeds like Flickr or any other feeds we can stream now The user can choose to filter feeds based on site, by clicking on an icon. When a user clicks an icon, we will build a new fxml page that is identical to the homepage.fxml except it will only display RSS for the selected site
